# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This is an excellent chance to secure a high-quality item at a price that is significantly below its true worth. I trust you'll find it beneficial and look forward to your positive response. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $110.

(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $110
(2) Reject Alice's offer
